topic.title: Bitcoin
topic.body:
Bitcoin discussion starts here:

Bitcoin is a P2P digital currency created by Satoshi Nakamono. It is the first cryptocurrency ever.
topic.body_p: Bitcoin discussion starts here:Bitcoin is a P2P digital currency created by Satoshi Nakamono. It is the first cryptocurrency ever.

topic.title: Monero
topic.body:
Monero is a cryptocurrency focused on privacy and fungibility. Monero transactions hide sender, recipient and amount. Privacy is mandatory in Monero and not optional like in other popular cryptocurrencies with private features. When we say that privacy is hiding in a crowd, in Monero the crowd is as big as the user community is.

Monero is the most popular fork of Bytecoin. It was created in 2014 as a community project because Bytecoin﻿ appeared on public when the almost 80% of coins had mined.
topic.body_p: Monero is a cryptocurrency focused on privacy and fungibility. Monero transactions hide sender, recipient and amount. Privacy is mandatory in Monero and not optional like in other popular cryptocurrencies with private features. When we say that privacy is hiding in a crowd, in Monero the crowd is as big as the user community is.Monero is the most popular fork of Bytecoin. It was created in 2014 as a community project because Bytecoin﻿ appeared on public when the almost 80% of coins had mined.

topic.title: Create topics about cryptocurrencies which you like

comment.body: New improvements of confidential transactions for Bitcoin will also affect Monero. Monero's RingCT are based on Greg Maxwell's Confidential Transactions. https://lists.linuxfoundation.org/pipermail/bitcoin-dev/2017-November/015283.html
